titleInfo.title: 'File 2/2 Public Health: study leave rules applicable to Assistant Surgeon in civil employment'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 16; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is also present in parallel between ff 4-15; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled, and are located in the same position as the main sequence.

mods.abstract: The file contains letters from the Persian Gulf Residency regarding study leave and facilities granted for the Military Assistant Surgeons. Earlier letters (dated 29 December 1925 and 10 September 1921), from the department of Education of the Government of India to the Residency, are also included in the file as enclosures.
